member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.Support.Middle.DesignSupport.AddSupportComponent(Ingr.SP3D.ReferenceData.Middle.Part,Ingr.SP3D.Common.Middle.Position)
member.summary: Adds the given part to the design support at the given location.
member.exception: One or more arguments are null.
Hanger part is invalid.
Failed to add the part to the design support.
Support is not in working status.
member.example:
This example shows how to add a hanger component to design support at the given location.
'Create the design support. Dim oDesignSup As DesignSupport = Nothing 'Create the hanger component. Dim oPart As Part = Nothing 'Set the position, where the hanger part needs to placed in the given design support. Dim oPosition As Position = Nothing 'Declare support component object. Dim oSupComp As SupportComponent = Nothing 'Using AddSupportComponent(), to add the hanger part to the design support at the given location. oSupComp = oDesignSup.AddSupportComponent(oPart, oPosition)

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.Support.Middle.DesignSupport.AddSupportComponent(Ingr.SP3D.ReferenceData.Middle.Part,Ingr.SP3D.Common.Middle.Position,Ingr.SP3D.Common.Middle.Position)
member.summary: Adds the given part to design support.
member.param: From position to add the support.
To position to add the support.
member.exception: One or more arguments are null.
Hanger part is invalid.
Failed to add the part to the design support.
Support is not in working status.
member.example:
This example shows how to add the part to the design support using from and to Positions.
'Create the design support. Dim oDesignSup As DesignSupport = Nothing 'Create the hanger component, which is the stretchable part. Dim oPart As Part = Nothing 'Define the from position and to position. Dim ofromPosition As Position = Nothing Dim otoPosition As Position = Nothing 'Declare support component object. Dim oSupComp As SupportComponent = Nothing 'Using AddSupportComponent(), to add the hanger part to the design support using from and to position. oSupComp = oDesignSup.AddSupportComponent(oPart, oPosition)

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.Support.Middle.DesignSupport.AddSupportComponent(System.String,Ingr.SP3D.Common.Middle.Position)
member.summary: Adds the part of the given part class to the design support.
member.exception: One or more arguments are null.
Hanger part is invalid.
Failed to add part to the design support.
Failed to get the part from part class.
Support is not in working status.
member.example:
This example shows how to add the part class of the hanger part to the design support.
'Create the design support. Dim oDesignSup As DesignSupport = Nothing 'Define the part class name of the hanger part. Dim sPartClass As String = Nothing 'Set the position, where the hanger part needs to be placed in the given design support. Dim oPosition As Position = Nothing 'Declare support component object. Dim oSupComp As SupportComponent = Nothing 'Using AddSupportComponent(), to add the part class of hanger part to the design support at the given location. oSupComp = oDesignSup.AddSupportComponent(sPartClass, oPosition)

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.Support.Middle.DesignSupport.AddSupportComponent(System.String,Ingr.SP3D.Common.Middle.Position,Ingr.SP3D.Common.Middle.Position)

member.example:
This example shows how to add the part class of the hanger part to the design support.
'Create the design support. Dim oDesignSup As DesignSupport = Nothing 'Define the PartClass name of the hanger part. Dim sPartClass As String = Nothing 'Define the from position and to position. Dim ofromPosition As Position = Nothing Dim otoPosition As Position = Nothing 'Declare support component object. Dim oSupComp As SupportComponent = Nothing 'Using AddSupportComponent(), to add the part class of hanger part to the design support using from and to position. oSupComp = oDesignSup.AddSupportComponent(sPartClass, ofromPosition, otoPosition)

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.Support.Middle.DesignSupport.AddSupportComponent(Ingr.SP3D.ReferenceData.Middle.Part,Ingr.SP3D.Support.Middle.SupportComponent,System.String)
member.summary: Adds the given part to the design support using port of the existing support component.
member.exception: One or more arguments are null.
Hanger part is invalid.
Failed to add part to the design support.
Failed to get the port from the support component.
Support is not in working status.
member.example:
This example shows how to add the hanger part to the design support at given port location of existing support component.
'Create the design support. Dim oDesignSup As DesignSupport = Nothing 'Define hanger part Dim oPart As Part = Nothing 'Define existing support component and port name of existing support component. Dim oExistingSupComp As SupportComponent = Nothing Dim sPortName As String = Nothing 'Declare support component object. Dim oSupComp As SupportComponent = Nothing 'Using AddSupportComponent(), to add the hanger part to the design support at given port location of existing support component. oSupComp = oDesignSup.AddSupportComponent(oPart, oExistingSupComp, sPortName)

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.Support.Middle.DesignSupport.AddSupportComponent(Ingr.SP3D.ReferenceData.Middle.Part,Ingr.SP3D.Support.Middle.SupportComponent,System.String,Ingr.SP3D.Support.Middle.SupportComponent,System.String)
member.summary: Adds the given part to the design support using ports of the existing support components.
member.exception: One or more arguments are null.
Hanger part is invalid.
Failed to add part to the design support.
Failed to get the port from the support component.
Support is not in working status.
member.example:
This example shows how to add the hanger part to the design support using the port lcoations of existing support components.
'Create the design support. Dim oDesignSup As DesignSupport = Nothing 'Define hanger part Dim oPart As Part = Nothing 'Define existing support component 1 and port name of existing support component 1. Dim oExistingSupComp1 As SupportComponent = Nothing Dim sPortName1 As String = Nothing 'Define existing support component 2 and port name of existing support component 2. Dim oExistingSupComp2 As SupportComponent = Nothing Dim sPortName2 As String = Nothing 'Declare support component object. Dim oSupComp As SupportComponent = Nothing 'Using AddSupportComponent(), to add the hanger part to the design support using the port lcoations of existing support components. oSupComp = oDesignSup.AddSupportComponent(oPart, oExistingSupComp1, sPortName1, oExistingSupComp2, sPortName2)
